resources.string: Do you want to add a movie?
Fast and Furious: Hobbs and Shaw

Freddie Mercury defies stereotypes and becomes one of the most recognized vocalists in world music. After leaving the band Queen to pursue a solo career, Mercury reunites with the band to give one of the best performances in rock n roll history.

The adventures of some cryptzologists from an agency as they try to confront monsters including Godzilla himself. Together they will try to stop these creatures who will do everything possible to survive.
In the mysterious town of Derry, a clown named Pennywise returns 27 years later to torment the now-grown members of the Losers Club, who find themselves estranged from each other.

Police officer Luke Hobbs teams up with mercenary Deckard Shaw to fight a terrorist possessing supernatural strength, a brilliant mind and a deadly pathogen that could wipe out half the worlds population.

Stella, 17, is admitted to a hospital with cystic fibrosis. His monotonous existence changes when Will, a teenager with the same ailment, arrives. However, hospital regulations prohibit contact between them.
A young autistic surgeon with sage syndrome begins work at a prestigious hospital. There he will have to overcome the skepticism with which his colleagues receive him.
The adventures of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking farmer, as he rises to become the King of the Vikings.
In the not too distant future, citizens fight to be part of the group of the privileged and thus avoid falling into devastation.
Teenagers attend an adventure camp on the opposite side of Isla Nublar and must band together to survive when dinosaurs wreak havoc on the island.
Las Encinas is the most exclusive school in Spain, the place where the children of the elite study and where three lower-class young people from a public school in ruins have just been admitted.
